Hierarchy For Package org.apache.logging.log4j.status

Class Hierarchy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.AbstractLogger (implements org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ExtendedLogger, java.io.Serializable)

    • org.apache.logging.log4j.status.StatusConsoleListener (implements org.apache.logging.log4j.status.StatusListener)

Interface Hierarchy
